entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
While these are difficult days in our great state, we are making progress:

✅ Declining percentage of Georgians testing positive for COVID-19 
✅ Record number of Georgians tested 
✅ New testing opportunities for vulnerable populations
